content:
My teacher at the Academia once said,
"Knowing many principles doesn't necessarily mean one can live life well."
It sounds quite logical, but...
info: 月下小聚后闲聊-幻雪_主流程文本2

content:
However, <color=#8AAB4B>{homestar} Road</color>
was the first world where I decided
to truly make a life for myself.
info: 月下小聚后闲聊-幻雪_主流程文本2

content:
Don't overwork yourself too much,
Mobai and Sani would be worried.
info: 月下小聚后闲聊-幻雪_主流程文本2

content: Life is full of mysterious coincidences—like our meeting in this very moment, the time we both left home and the paths we chose to take...
info: 月下小聚后闲聊-幻雪_主流程文本2

content:
I cannot resist the allure of mysterious things,
Like a moth drawn to flame,
Curiosity is perhaps both my defining trait... and my weakness.
info: 月下小聚后闲聊-幻雪_主流程文本2

content: Sometimes, a single choice can make all the difference, and we might never know when we miss an opportunity with someone... How mysterious~.
info: 月下小聚后闲聊-幻雪_主流程文本2

content:
Your body always knows when your spirit is depleted before you do.
It's quite fascinating - for instance, the Faintglow on my tail... it's dimming!
I suppose that's my cue to get some rest~
info: 月下小聚后闲聊-幻雪_主流程文本2

content:
<color=#8AAB4B>{homestar} Road</color>, <color=#8AAB4B>{homestar} Road</color>...
Naming something is quite the perplexing matter,
One must consider timing, location, and the context of its origins.
info: 月下小聚后闲聊-幻雪_主流程文本2

content:
I rarely feel anxious about unfamiliar places,
Perhaps it's due to my extensive experience as a traveler.
info: 月下小聚后闲聊-幻雪_主流程文本2

content:
But then there are names like our "World Bubble,"
that just pop into existence like a flash of inspiration,
unique and free-spirited—quite mysterious indeed.
info: 月下小聚后闲聊-幻雪_主流程文本2

content:
What does it truly mean to "live well"?
Who has the right to define that?
When you think about it, isn't it enough to find worth in your own way?
info: 月下小聚后闲聊-幻雪_主流程文本2
